snippet: Mylan shares slumped after reports that the company overcharged Medicaid over five years for its EpiPen allergy treatment....
abstract: Stocks end mostly mixed as investors wait another day for Labor Dept jobs report.
lead_paragraph: Mylan shares slumped after reports that the company overcharged Medicaid over five years for its EpiPen allergy treatment.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Mixed as Oil Prices Rise
